description:
Modern and easy to use SQL client for MySQL, Postgres, SQLite, SQL Server, and more.


A bunch of bug fixes.
What's Changed
- fix copying sql from result table by @azmy60 in #2831
- fix multi row selection for deletion and cloning by @azmy60 in #2830
- Plugin System: add plugin protocol by @azmy60 in #2828
- fix editor modal shortcut by @not-night-but in #2840
- fix editor modal esc by @not-night-but in #2842
- fix exporting filtered view in mysql by @not-night-but in #2838
- fix row filter builder toggle by @azmy60 in #2829
- Fix blocking operations in connection interface by @azmy60 in #2814
- fix: hide import from local workspace when it should by @azmy60 in #2808
- [FIX] Issue #2811 - Fallback for empty passwords by @SamBrishes in #2813
- Fix: small json viewer fold button by @azmy60 in #2801
- Fix: JSON Viewer Bottleneck by @azmy60 in #2787
- fix: disable run button while query is loading by @therealrinku in #2759
- Documentation for querying files in DuckDB by @azmy60 in #2819
- Added note that ~/Library is typically hidden by @knumat in #2850
- Fix broken json row viewer arrow by @azmy60 in #2852
- fix app version license checking by @not-night-but in #2855
- updating docs by @rathboma in #2730
- Fix DuckDB client issues by @rathboma in #2859
- fix parse url for file endings by @not-night-but in #2871
New Contributors
- @SamBrishes made their first contribution in #2813
- @knumat made their first contribution in #2850
Full Changelog: v5.1.4...v5.1.5
